name: War for the Planet of the Stickmen
name_original: War for the Planet of the Stickmen
description:
Left Mouse to shoot.

Right Mouse to grab stuff.

WASD to move.

ONE RULE: Let BLUE stay alive!

When no REDs are left you WIN!

If you die, you LOSE!

FRIENDS you kill turn out RED! (only once and then dead)

REDs you kill turn out BLUEs! (only once and then dead)

The game was made for the brackets jam 2021.2 in 1 day.
